snippet: Carlos Tavares could take over as chief executive of PSA Peugeot Citroen <PEUP.PAP> in March, two sources close to the situation said....

headline.print_headline: Tavares Could Take Helm of Peugeot in March: Sources
headline.main: Tavares Could Take Helm of Peugeot in March: Sources

lead_paragraph: Carlos Tavares could take over as chief executive of PSA Peugeot Citroen <PEUP.PAP> in March, two sources close to the situation said.
